31 typedef struct InfoForSyncReadParam{

35 typedef struct ParamForSyncReadInst{
36  uint16_t addr;
37  uint16_t length;
38  uint8_t id_count;

40 } ParamForSyncReadInst_t;

100 typedef struct InfoSyncBulkBuffer{
101  uint8_t* p_buf;
102  uint16_t buf_capacity;
103  uint16_t gen_length;
104  bool is_completed;
105 } __attribute__((packed)) InfoSyncBulkBuffer_t;
106 
107 /* Sync Instructions */
108 typedef struct XELInfoSyncRead{
109  uint8_t *p_recv_buf;
110  uint8_t id;
111  uint8_t error;
112 } __attribute__((packed)) XELInfoSyncRead_t;
113 
114 typedef struct InfoSyncReadInst{
115  uint16_t addr;
116  uint16_t addr_length;
117  XELInfoSyncRead_t* p_xels;
118  uint8_t xel_count;
119  bool is_info_changed;
120  InfoSyncBulkBuffer_t packet;
121 } __attribute__((packed)) InfoSyncReadInst_t;
122 
123 typedef struct XELInfoSyncWrite{
124  uint8_t* p_data;
125  uint8_t id;
126 } __attribute__((packed)) XELInfoSyncWrite_t;
127 
128 typedef struct InfoSyncWriteInst{
129  uint16_t addr;
130  uint16_t addr_length;
131  XELInfoSyncWrite_t* p_xels;
132  uint8_t xel_count;
133  bool is_info_changed;
134  InfoSyncBulkBuffer_t packet;
135 } __attribute__((packed)) InfoSyncWriteInst_t;
136 
137 /* Bulk Instructions */
138 typedef struct XELInfoBulkRead{
139  uint16_t addr;
140  uint16_t addr_length;
141  uint8_t *p_recv_buf;
142  uint8_t id;
143  uint8_t error;
144 } __attribute__((packed)) XELInfoBulkRead_t;
145 
146 typedef struct InfoBulkReadInst{
147  XELInfoBulkRead_t* p_xels;
148  uint8_t xel_count;
149  bool is_info_changed;
150  InfoSyncBulkBuffer_t packet;
151 } __attribute__((packed)) InfoBulkReadInst_t;
152 
153 typedef struct XELInfoBulkWrite{
154  uint16_t addr;
155  uint16_t addr_length;
156  uint8_t* p_data;
157  uint8_t id;
158 } __attribute__((packed)) XELInfoBulkWrite_t;
159 
160 typedef struct InfoBulkWriteInst{
161  XELInfoBulkWrite_t* p_xels;
162  uint8_t xel_count;
163  bool is_info_changed;
164  InfoSyncBulkBuffer_t packet;
165 } __attribute__((packed)) InfoBulkWriteInst_t;

169 class Master
170 {
171  public:
184  Master(DXLPortHandler &port, float protocol_ver = 2.0, uint16_t malloc_buf_size = 256);
185 
195  Master(float protocol_ver = 2.0, uint16_t malloc_buf_size = 256);
196 
197  bool setPacketBuffer(uint8_t* p_buf, uint16_t buf_capacity);
198  uint8_t* getPacketBuffer() const;
199  uint16_t getPacketBufferCapacity() const;
200 
201  bool setPortProtocolVersion(float version);
202  bool setPortProtocolVersionUsingIndex(uint8_t version_idx);
203  float getPortProtocolVersion() const;
204 
205  bool setPort(DXLPortHandler &port);
206  bool setPort(DXLPortHandler *p_port);
207  DXLPortHandler* getPort() const;
208 
209  /* Instructions */
210  uint8_t ping(uint8_t id, uint8_t *p_recv_id_array, uint8_t recv_array_capacity,
211  uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
212  uint8_t ping(uint8_t id, InfoFromPing_t *recv_ping_info_array, uint8_t recv_array_cnt,
213  uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
214  int32_t read(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr, uint16_t addr_length,
215  uint8_t *p_recv_buf, uint16_t recv_buf_capacity, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
216  bool write(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr,
217  const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
218  bool writeNoResp(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr,
219  const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length);
220  bool regWrite(uint8_t id, uint16_t addr,
221  const uint8_t *p_data, uint16_t data_length, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
222  bool action(uint8_t id, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
223  bool factoryReset(uint8_t id, uint8_t option, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
224  bool reboot(uint8_t id, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
225  bool clear(uint8_t id, uint8_t option, uint32_t ex_option, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
226  uint8_t syncRead(InfoSyncReadInst_t* p_info, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
227  bool syncWrite(InfoSyncWriteInst_t* p_info);
228  uint8_t bulkRead(InfoBulkReadInst_t* p_info, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
229  bool bulkWrite(InfoBulkWriteInst_t* p_info);
230 
231  uint8_t getLastStatusPacketError() const;
232 
233  void setLastLibErrCode(DXLLibErrorCode_t err_code);
234  DXLLibErrorCode_t getLastLibErrCode() const;
235 
236  // raw APIs
237  bool txInstPacket(uint8_t id, uint8_t inst_idx, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len);
238  const InfoToParseDXLPacket_t* rxStatusPacket(uint8_t* p_param_buf, uint16_t param_buf_cap, uint32_t timeout_ms = 10);
239 
240  // >> Legacy (Deprecated since v0.4.0)
241  bool syncRead(const ParamForSyncReadInst_t &param_info, RecvInfoFromStatusInst_t &recv_info, uint32_t timeout_ms = 100);
242  bool syncWrite(const ParamForSyncWriteInst_t &param_info);
243  bool bulkRead(const ParamForBulkReadInst_t &param_info, RecvInfoFromStatusInst_t &recv_info, uint32_t timeout_ms = 100);
244  bool bulkWrite(const ParamForBulkWriteInst_t &param_info);
245  // << Legacy (Deprecated since v0.4.0)
246 
247  private:
248  DXLPortHandler *p_port_;
249 
250  uint8_t protocol_ver_idx_;
251 
252  bool is_buf_malloced_;
253  uint8_t *p_packet_buf_;
254  uint16_t packet_buf_capacity_;
255  InfoToMakeDXLPacket_t info_tx_packet_;
256  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t info_rx_packet_;
257 
258  DXLLibErrorCode_t last_lib_err_;
259 };
